title: Enterprise accounts can now index up to 10,000 pages at no extra charge.

content.value: Enterprise accounts can now index up to 10,000 pages at no extra charge.

content.content:
Corporate accounts could submit 2,000 pages per day. From now on, you can go up to 10,000 per day. Simply add new keys and index your very large projects in no time. 

I can't wait to see the number of visits increase in just a few days!

description: Now Foudroyer is stable, I can allow users to go harder in the number of submissions to Google at the same time.
